The movie isn't about finding the murderer, it's about Deke's demons, and him trying to prevent the same thing happening to Baxter
Deke bought the red barrette to make Jim believes that Albert is a killer so that he will feel relieved that he killed the killer and removed that guilt.
description:
We take a deep dive into HBO Max and Warner Brothers "The Little Things" starring Denzel Washington, Rami Malek, and Jared Leto. We analyze its ending, who the real killers is, and what really happened.
